text: Valbirse is a new municipality of the administrative district of Jura bernois in the canton of Bern in Switzerland. On 1 January 2015, the former municipalities of BÃ©vilard, Malleray and Pontenet merged into the new municipality of Valbirse. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website of the municipality of Valbirse Category:Municipalities in Jura bernois Category:2015 establishments in Switzerland
title: Valbirse
